item.title: 扎克伯格访问白宫，讨论美国科技领导力问题
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc.公司发言人安迪-斯通（Andy Stone）在 X 网站上发表文章说，公司首席执行官马克-扎克伯格周四访问了白宫，讨论公司如何支持特朗普政府加强美国科技领导力的努力。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. Chief Executive Officer Mark Zuckerberg visited the White House on Thursday to discuss how the company can support Trump administration efforts to strengthen US tech leadership, company spokesman Andy Stone said in a post on X.】

item.title: 贝森特在与马斯克 "完全保持一致 "的同时表现出平常心
item.description: 斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）担任财政部部长仅两周时间，就经历了许多动荡。财政部成为了埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）打击联邦开支的目标，引发了贝森特办公室外的抗议活动；唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统难以预测的贸易政策也让投资者惶恐不安。【原文：In just two weeks as Treasury chief, Scott Bessent has seen plenty of turbulence. The department became a target of Elon Musk’s crackdown on federal spending — triggering protests outside Bessent’s office — and investors are on edge over President Donald Trump’s unpredictable trade policies.】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利说，美国银行告诉我他们希望实施巴塞尔协议
item.description: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，美国贷款机构热衷于引入新的资本要求，即使监管机构暂停这些措施以观察特朗普政府如何对待华尔街。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey said American lenders are keen for new capital requirements to be introduced, even as regulators pause the measures to see how the Trump administration approaches Wall Street.】

item.title: 美国就业报告公布前，亚洲股市下跌，日元升值：市场综述
item.description: 周五亚洲股市早盘下跌，此前华尔街走势平淡，交易商在等待美国就业数据，这些数据将有助于阐明未来的利率走势。【原文：Asian stocks headed for early declines Friday after muted moves on Wall Street as traders awaited US jobs data that will help illuminate the path ahead for interest rates.】

item.title: 特朗普震荡下注，交易员利润瞬间蒸发
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普发动贸易战的初期，市场出现了一波又一波的进退，迫使交易商不得不做出调整，越来越多地下注于比往常更保守或更容易逆转的交易。【原文：The early days of Donald Trump’s trade war have been marked by a flurry of advances and retreats, forcing traders to adapt by increasingly making bets that are more conservative than usual or easily reversed.】

item.title: 美联储洛根对进一步降息的必要性持怀疑态度
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）表示，利率可能已经接近中性水平，即使通胀继续降温，也可能无需进一步降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas President Lorie Logan said interest rates may already be near a neutral level, potentially obviating the need for further cuts even if inflation continues to cool.】

item.title: 特朗普加大压力，欧洲因市场崩溃而步履蹒跚
item.description:
支离破碎的系统让企业感到沮丧，并损害了经济。【原文：

A fractured system is frustrating businesses and hurting the economy.

】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰不会跟随同行建立私人信贷市场
item.description: 另类投资公司蓝猫（Blue Owl Capital）并不打算步竞争对手的后尘，这些竞争对手一直在建立私人信用贷款市场。【原文：Alternative investment firm Blue Owl Capital is not planning to follow in the footsteps of competitors who have been setting up marketplaces for private credit loans.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒尔称稳定币可巩固美元的储备地位
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）表示，他支持稳定币，因为它们有可能提升美元作为储备货币的地位，不过它们需要一套明确的规则和监管。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said he’s supportive of stablecoins because they are likely to propagate the dollar’s status as a reserve currency, though they need a clear set of rules and regulations.】

item.title: 亚马逊预计利润低于预期，原因是人工智能支出增加
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）预计本季度的利润低于分析师的预期，这表明该公司将继续加大支出以支持人工智能服务。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. projected profit in the current quarter that fell short of analysts’ estimates, suggesting the company continues to ramp up spending to support artificial intelligence services.】

item.title: Pinterest 第四季度销售额和营收前景超出预期
item.description: Pinterest 公司公布了强劲的假日季度营收，并对当期销售额做出了乐观的预测，这表明尽管来自社交网络领域规模更大的竞争对手的竞争日益激烈，该公司的广告业务仍在继续增长。该公司股价在尾盘交易中大涨超过 27%。【原文：Pinterest Inc. posted strong holiday-quarter revenue and gave an upbeat forecast for sales in the current period, a sign that its advertising business continues to grow despite increased competition from much larger rivals in the social networking space. The shares surged more than 27% in late trading.】

item.title: Expedia 节假日预订量强劲，证明需求具有弹性
item.description: Expedia Group Inc. 公布的 2024 年最后几个月的总预订量好于预期，反映了冬季假日季节旅游需求的恢复性增长。【原文：Expedia Group Inc. posted better-than-expected gross bookings for the final months of 2024, reflecting resilient demand for travel during the winter holiday season.】

item.title: DeepSeek 病毒式成功后，OpenAI 酝酿产品变革
item.description:
ChatGPT 制造商重新思考开源和应用程序设计方法。【原文：

ChatGPT maker rethinking approach to open source and app design.

】

item.title: 利率乐观、贸易战成为澳大利亚财报焦点
item.description: 在这个财报季，澳大利亚投资者最关心的是降息前景、贸易战的不安情绪和消费支出的弹性。【原文：The prospect of lower interest rates, trade war jitters and resilient consumer spending are top of mind for Australian investors this earnings season.】

item.title: 阿根廷国会支持米莱伊暂停初选投票的申请
item.description: 阿根廷国会下议院投票决定暂停今年中期投票的初选，为总统哈维尔-米莱伊领导的党派在议会中的影响力增添动力。【原文：Argentina’s lower house of Congress voted to suspend a primary election for this year’s midterm vote, building on momentum for President Javier Milei’s party to boost its presence in the legislature.】

item.title: Spotify 进军视频领域，却错过了一些最重要的播客节目
item.description:
New Heights 和Club Shay Shay等热门节目尚未将其视频放到流媒体服务中

。【原文：

Popular programs like New Heights and Club Shay Shay have yet to put their videos on the streaming service

】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）代理主席范姆撤换了调查她的人力资源主管
item.description: 据直接了解此事的人士称，商品期货交易委员会代理主席卡罗琳-范（Caroline Pham）解除了该机构人力资源主管的职务。【原文：The Commodity Futures Trading Commission’s acting chair, Caroline Pham, removed the agency’s head of human resources, who was leading an internal investigation into staff complaints against Pham for creating a hostile work environment, according to people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 据说温克艾沃斯双胞胎的加密货币交易所 Gemini 正在权衡 IPO 事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由亿万富翁温克艾沃斯双胞胎支持的加密货币公司 Gemini 正在考虑最快于今年进行首次公开募股。【原文：Gemini, the cryptocurrency firm backed by the billionaire Winklevoss twins, is considering an initial public offering as soon as this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 跨山公司认为关税威胁有助于加快管道填埋速度
item.description: 如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）兑现对加拿大原油征收关税的威胁，那么加拿大的跨山石油管道最早可能在今年满负荷运转。【原文：Canada’s Trans Mountain oil pipeline, which allows producers to sell crude to markets in Asia, could fill to capacity as early as this year if US President Donald Trump follows through with threats to impose tariffs on the country’s crude, according to an executive for the government-owned project.】

item.title: 央行高层称通胀风险更具两面性
item.description: 国际清算银行总经理奥古斯丁-卡斯滕斯（Agustin Carstens）表示，消费价格风险的可预测性已经降低。【原文：Risks to consumer prices have become less predictable, according to Bank for International Settlements General Manager Agustin Carstens.】

item.title: Salesforce、Workday 为节省开支增加海外招聘
item.description: 软件公司面临着在不影响利润的情况下投资新的人工智能能力的压力。为降低成本，一种日益流行的策略是将招聘工作转移到美国以外的地区。【原文：Software companies are under pressure to invest in new artificial intelligence capabilities without denting profits. One increasingly popular strategy to keep costs low is to shift hiring outside the US.】

item.title: Citadel 详述多策略基金 570 亿美元的丰厚收益
item.description: 在这家史上最赚钱的对冲基金公司利润最丰厚的时期，Citadel 让人们难得一见其多策略基金的庐山真面目。【原文：Citadel offered a rare glimpse under the hood of its multistrategy funds during a lucrative period for the most profitable hedge fund firm ever.】

item.title: 贝森特称房利-弗莱迪发放取决于抵押贷款利率
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac）这两家政府资助的巨型企业能否摆脱目前的监管，将取决于对抵押贷款利率的影响。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said that any release of the two giant government-sponsored enterprises, Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, from their current conservatorship would depend on the implications for mortgage rates.】

item.title: Banxico 提供半点削减，考虑提供更多同等规模的产品
item.description: 墨西哥央行将其关键利率下调了半个百分点，并表示随着通胀率回到目标区间、经济增长放缓以及美国关税被推迟，将考虑进一步下调相同幅度的利率。【原文：Mexico’s central bank delivered a half-point cut to its key interest rate and said it would consider additional reductions of the same size as inflation is back on the target range, growth is slowing and US tariffs have been delayed.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚公共信贷总监下周即将卸任
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，哥伦比亚公共信贷主管在为总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）政府管理金融战略两年多后即将离职。【原文：Colombia’s head of public credit is leaving his post after more than two years of managing financial strategy for President Gustavo Petro’s government, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储主席古尔斯比认为不确定性推动降息步伐放缓
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，虽然财政政策的不确定性可能导致降息次数减少，但他认为在未来 18 个月内仍会有一些降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said that while fiscal policy uncertainty may lead to fewer rate cuts, he still sees some reductions over the next 18 months.】

item.title: 贝森特表示特朗普执政期间强势美元政策保持不变
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，在唐纳德-特朗普总统的领导下，美国将继续奉行 "强势美元 "政策。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said that the US continues to have a “strong dollar” policy under President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 贝森特称马斯克的 DOGE 不会改变财政系统
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，他亲自审查了埃隆-马斯克政府效率团队中的财政部员工，这些员工拥有联邦支付数据的只读权限，而且没有对该部门的支付系统进行 "修补"。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said he personally vetted the Treasury employees on Elon Musk’s government efficiency team with read-only access to federal payment data, and that there’s been no “tinkering” with the department’s payment systems.】

item.title: 意大利在 Paschi 竞购 Mediobanca 时会见贝莱德官员
item.description: 意大利财政部长和贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Italy’s finance chief and BlackRock Inc.’s top officials met on Thursday, discussing several topics including the takeover bid by Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA of Mediobanca SpA.】

item.title: 摩根大通顶级欧洲能源交易员达尼埃莱-阿帕退休
item.description: 摩根大通自然资源团队的高级交易员 Daniele Apa 已从这家华尔街公司退休。【原文：Daniele Apa, a senior dealmaker in JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s natural resources team, has retired from the Wall Street firm.】
